message: Let's be fair and divide it 60-40, considering I'm taking the risk of inflation!
I understand your concerns about inflation, but 60-40 isn't fair to me. Let's split it evenly.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was quite generous. I'll make a small concession, 58-42 is the most I can offer.
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm offering you a deal where you still get a significant share, but it recognizes that I'm not losing value with each round.
I understand your point, but I'm the one losing value here. I'll try to meet you halfway, 56-44 is my new offer.
Alice, I'm willing to be fair, but the deal needs to reflect the fact that I'm not affected by the inflation. This is my final offer.
